src:
Live Streaming AC Milan vs Lazio
03 Nov 2019, 23:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Duel seru akan tersaji di San Siro pada Senin (4/11/2019) dini hari WIB ketika tuan rumah AC Milan menjamu Lazio dalam lanjutan Serie A 2019-20. Berikut live streaming AC Milan vs Lazio selengkapnya.
AC Milan baru saja meraih kemenangan pertamanya di bawah asuhan sang allenatore anyar, Stefano Pioli. Mereka menang 1-0 saat menjamu SPAL di San Siro (01/11/2019). Sebelumnya, Pioli hanya bisa membawa Milan meraih hasil imbang kontra Lecce dan kalah dari AS Roma.
Di sisi lain, Lazio dalam tren yang lebih positif. Tim asuhan Simone Inzaghi itu tak tersentuh kekalahan di lima laga Serie A terakhirnya, termasuk dua kemenangan dalam dua laga terbaru, masing-masing kontra Fiorentina dan Torino.
Dalam laga kandangnya melawan Lazio di Serie A musim lalu, Milan menang 1-0 lewat penalti Franck Kessie menit 79.
Terakhir kali menjamu Lazio, di leg kedua babak semifinal Coppa Italia musim lalu, Milan menyerah 0-1 oleh gol tunggal Joaquin Correa menit 58, dan tersingkir dengan agregat 0-1.
text:
Live Streaming of AC Milan vs Lazio
Nov 3 2019, 23:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - An exciting duel will be presented at the San Siro on Monday (11/04/2019) early morning hrs when AC Milan host Lazio in the 2019-20 Serie A continuation. Following AC Milan vs Lazio live streaming in full.
AC Milan has just won its first victory under the care of the new Allenatore, Stefano Pioli. They won 1-0 when they hosted SPAL at the San Siro (01/11/2019). Previously, Pioli could only bring Milan to a draw against Lecce and lost to AS Roma.
On the other hand, Lazio are in a more positive trend. Simone Inzaghi's team have been left untouched in their last five Serie A matches, including two wins in the two most recent matches, one each against Fiorentina and Torino.
In his home match against Lazio in Serie A last season, Milan won 1-0 through a 79th minute Franck Kessie penalty.
The last time entertaining Lazio, in the second leg of the Coppa Italia semifinal last season, Milan gave up 0-1 by a single goal by Joaquin Correa in the 58th minute, and was knocked out 0-1 on aggregate.
